thread.section_title: Stickerkid Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Stickerkid | www.stickerkid.com
thread.title: A grateful Ninja Warrior Dad
thread.title_full: Stickerkid bewertet von A grateful Ninja Warrior Dad

author: A grateful Ninja Warrior Dad
title: A grateful Ninja Warrior Dad
text:
All the sticker and label graphics were awesome for my 5 year old son. He loves it. My little Ninja.
The 1(one) item that frustrated me was the Iron on Labels. It was hard for me to Iron on the label, while holding it straight so it would not curl. It would be nice if the Iron-ON would have an adhesive backing so the label can be ironed on without wrinkles.
The second item which isn't a big deal, is i have too many labels. I wish i was able to add myself on the labels too (like 2 kids). I get my lunch stolen at work, so I would like to put yellow Ninja on my sandwich or lasagna.
that's about it. you guys rock!
